DOC.brief_summary: The goal of the TAXUS™ Element™ Paclitaxel-Eluting Coronary Stent System European Post-Approval Surveillance Study is to evaluate real world clinical outcomes data for the TAXUS™ Element™ Coronary Stent System in unselected patients in routine clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: TAXUS® Element™ Paclitaxel-Eluting Coronary Stent System European Post-Approval Surveillance Study (TE-Prove)
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective, open label, multi-center observational study with an all-comers enrollment approach of approximately 1000 subjects at up to 50 sites in Europe.
DOC.criteria: According to Instructions For Use Contraindications according to Instructions for Use
